context: Hello! What kind of movies are you looking for today?
Hi! I'm looking for something scary. My favorite is Saw (2004)
I'm not super familiar with scary movies. I have a friend who loves them and prefers the classics like A Nightmare on Elm Street (1984) and Bride of Chucky (1998)
Oh yeah, I've seen A Nightmare on Elm Street (1984) and loved it, but not any of the Chucky movies. I'll have to check out Chucky. What about something like a thriller? I'm a huge fan of Taken (2008)
I havent seen Taken but I did enjoy Inception (2010) which is a thriller in sort of a different vein
Oh, that one was good. A lot of odd filming techniques in that. Can you think of any others?
resp: Thrillers like Inception (2010) I would also suggest Gravity (2013) as well.
